extendedInfo.description: Modern Square clock for your home screen that includes a themed battery percentage bar.If you like this skin and would like to use hotspots or change the colour, try the paid version: http://goo.gl/Dqw09Please carefully read through all of the notes and instructions if this is your first UCCW Skin. After it is installed you won't find this skin/widget listed in your app drawer, it will only be visible when adding a new widget to your home screens.Please email me if you have any questions or issues!BEFORE USE===========You will need to install the latest version of Ultimate Custom Clock Widget (UCCW) before you are able to use this skin. It is free, and you can download it from the Play Store here: http://goo.gl/q3PehThanks to VasuDev for UCCW!HOW TO USE===========Add the widget to your home screen.1) Add a new widget in the usual way (ie. press and hold on a blank part of your home screen).2) Select UCCW and the size you would like, this depends on how many rows/columns you have your launcher set to. I use and recommend Apex Launcher.3) From the list of widgets, select "Square Home"4) Resize the widget if necessary and touch the pointing finger.EDIT HOTSPOTS=============1)  Load UCCW and make sure hotspots are turned OFF (do this by clicking menu, hotspots mode, off).2) Touch the Square Home widget, UCCW should load and show the 3 hotspots.3) Select each hotspot and make sure they load the app or shortcut you prefer.4) Make sure you turn hotspots back ON in order to utilize them!

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Makes it so easy to check the weather &  looks very nice with my wallpaper
reviews.author: Lori Mackenzie

reviews.title: Missing hotspot
reviews.comment: Should add a hotspot option for it to be clickable. But nice!
reviews.author: Brian Barria

reviews.title: Help?
reviews.comment: I cant get it to centralize. Have 4 columns currently. A 4x2widget looks too big and the 3x2 one is always off center.
reviews.author: Joel Alfaro

reviews.title: Sleek clock, excellent support
reviews.comment: Dev is friendly and responds quickly.  Will be looking for more themes and apps from them.

reviews.comment: Looks good! I especially like the battery bar.
